Software

ABySS

Scalable de novo genome assembler with short reads

 ARCS

Genome scaffolder by linked read alignment
ARKS

Genome scaffolder by linked read kmer mapping

 BioBloom Tools

Memory efficient sequence read mapping with Bloom filters
ChopStitch

De novo exon prediction and splicegraph construction

 DIDA

Sequence alignment pipeline to distribute indexing/alignment stages on a compute farm
Kollector

Targeted de novo gene assembly pipeline

 LINKS

Alignment-free genome scaffolder with long error-rich DNA sequences
NanoSim

Nanopore read sequence simulator, guided by technology-specific features

 ntCard

Streaming algorithm for cardinality estimation in genomics datasets
ntHash

Recursive hashing algorithm tuned for processing DNA/RNA sequences

 PAVFinder

Python package to identify structural variants from de novo assemblies
Cobbler/RAILS

Gap-filling (cobbler) and scaffolding (RAILS) by long DNA sequence alignment

 Tigmint

Misassembly correction utility with linked reads
Trans-ABySS

De novo transcriptome assembler

 xmatchview

Genome sequence alignment visualization
